name: Unknown
Violation: illegal dumping of hazardous waste in a protected wetland area
Location: Los Padres National Forest, 50 miles northwest of Los Angeles
nature_of_incident: environmental violation involving the illegal dumping of toxic waste into the ocean by a nearby industrial facility
consequences: contamination of the nearby water sources and soil
Environmental Impact: Soil and water contamination, habitat destruction
Remediation Efforts: Halt drilling operation, assess environmental damage, restore affected areas, prevent further harm
